mapper.select: select a.* ,b.m_name, b.m_mobile from orderend a, member b where a.m_id=b.m_id and a.s_se=#{param1} order by a.o_seqno
mapper.update: update orderend set o_status=#{param1} where o_seqno=#{param2}
mapper.select: select a.* ,b.m_name, b.m_mobile from orderend a, member b where a.m_id=b.m_id and a.s_se=#{param1} order by a.o_seqno
